headline: Man with 2 guns arrested at Disneyland Paris hotel
content: By Laura Akhoun and Jason Hanna, CNNUpdated 1957 GMT (0357 HKT) January 28, 2016  (CNN)A man who had luggage containing two firearms and ammunition was arrested Thursday at the entrance to a hotel near Disneyland Paris, and investigators are looking for a woman who was with him, police said. CNN's Laura Akhoun reported from Paris, and Jason Hanna wrote and reported from Atlanta.
